titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the FICA tax inapplicable to overtime hours of small business employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/4/1997--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make the Federal Insurance Contributions Act tax inapplicable to overtime hours (more than 40 hours in a week) of small business (fewer than 20 full-time employees) employees.
